overview: This measure appropriates moneys for the Judiciary for the fiscal biennium that begins on July 1, 2025, and ends on June 30, 2027. [9] Your Committee recommends that the Judiciary budget be amended by providing an additional $1,000,000 (HB400_SD1_SSCR1253_.htm.txt) for civil legal services and $750,000 (HB400_SD1_SSCR1253_.htm.txt) for legal services to individuals in immigration-related court proceedings. [9] Your Committee has amended this measure by changing the effective date to April 23, 2057, to facilitate further discussion on the measure. [9]
